author: fuankg
msg: Added another useful NetWare start script.

author: mgrigorov
msg: WICKET-3126 Drop HomePageMapper in favour of MountedMapper("/", MyPage.class)
HomePageMapper now extends MountedMapper to be able to create Url "/" with proper query parameters.
This way opening "/" for the application still stays at "/" after redirect (when using redirect_to_xyz strategy).

author: uschindler
msg: LUCENE-2838: ConstantScoreQuery now directly supports wrapping a Query instance for stripping off scores
